titles.title: Lord of glory, we adore Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord of glory, we adore Thee! Christ of God, ascended high! Heart and soul we bow before Thee, Glorious now beyond the sky: Thee we worship, Thee we praise— Excellent in all Thy ways.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anointed King, with glory crowned, Rightful Heir and Lord of all! Once rejected, scorned, disowned, E’en by those Thou cam’st to call: Thee we honor, Thee adore— Glorious now and evermore.{/lang-eng}
